attributes.long-description:
The Euro Fishing Season Pass US Edition saves money and grants access to the next 3 lake add-ons upon their release

Each venue will be unique in its own right with a stunning setting, new boss fish, more trophies, and great angling experiences.

Begin with our new French venue, Le Lac d’or, home to some monster fish and introduces a new species – the Koi Carp. Then with two more add-ons included in this Season Pass, you can be certain you will need all of your skills, knowledge and equipment to master the new venues and their new challenges.

With one lake releasing in 2017 and a further two more in early 2018 you will be hooked for months to come!

• Lake 1 – Le lac d’or
• Lake 2 – Waldsee
• Lake 3 – Early 2018

Three fantastic venues, one great price! Requires Euro Fishing core game, sold separately.


1 player
Network Players 2-4
DUALSHOCK®4

Software subject to license (us.playstation.com/softwarelicense). Online features require an account and are subject to terms of service and applicable privacy policy (playstationnetwork.com/terms-of-service & playstationnetwork.com/privacy-policy). One-time license fee for play on account’s designated primary PS4™ system and other PS4™ systems when signed in with that account.
